categories.description: SECOR is able to offer training at your location or ours to increase your efficiency, productivity and safety when performing all PE pipe heat procedures. Mcelroy Fusion Equipment Training course offerings are available in Small Diameter, Medium Diameter, and Large Diameter. We are also able to offer Fusion Inspector Training.

SECOR offers a variety of trainings to help you stay certified and safe with your gas related tooling and equipment: -Butt Fusion Training -Sidewall Fusion Training -Electrofusion Training -Mustang Polyethylene Squeeze Tool Training -Regent Squeeze Tool Training-Mueller Equipment Training
